passives.name: Wrath
passives.effects: Basic attacks deal {{as|30 '''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit.

passives.name: Seething Strike
passives.effects: Basic attacks grant {{as|8% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 3 seconds, stacking up to 4 times for a total of {{as|32% '''bonus''' attack speed}}. At maximum stacks, basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} also grant a ''Phantom'' stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 ''Phantom'' stacks, the next basic attack consumes all of those stacks {{tip|on-attack}} to trigger a ''Phantom Hit'' that applies {{tip|on-hit}} effects to the target after a {{fd|0.15}}-second delay.

effects_structured.raw: Basic attacks deal {{as 30 '''bonus''' magic damage}} on-hit.
Basic attacks grant {{as 8% '''bonus''' attack speed}} for 3 seconds, stacking up to 4 times for a total of {{as 32% '''bonus''' attack speed}}
At maximum stacks, basic attacks {{tip on-attack}} also grant a ''Phantom'' stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks

At 2 ''Phantom'' stacks, the next basic attack consumes all of those stacks {{tip on-attack}} to trigger a ''Phantom Hit'' that applies {{tip on-hit}} effects to the target after a {{fd 0.15}}-second delay.
